segments.text: I'm sorry . I've lost my tags and receipt . How can I do about it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . What is your baggage ? And do not remember the tag's number or color ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's a suitcase . But I've forgot the exact color . Maybe it is red or something .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you give me a description of your case ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's like this . It's square with a leather cover . Yes , I remember , there is a green string around the handle . That's right .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll check it for you ... sorry to keep you waiting . I've found it.Is this yours ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , It is the right one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Will you show me your key card , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . Now you can take your case away .
segments.speaker: S2
